root.description: Campaign breakdownHuman CampaignWind of the SteppesAgainst the WindRapid RescueBack to DerenhalleFreiburg's DestinyPlains of LeranseGenerals of LeranseWings of VersonDeserted CityBloody WavesOrc CampaignConquest of GoblinsReconnaissance in ForceJoining the majorityFall of IrandFall of FreiburgLand Of KnightsWar in The AirTrap for the KingThe Fall of VersonTo the Last SeaAlliance Campaign (unlocked after completing human and orc campaign)Secret missionOfrisUnmaskingBreakthroughKnights of the SwordUgraum's RevengeDesperate DriveThe Last BattleSYSTEM REQUIREMENTSMinimum system requirements:Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV 1,5 GHz or AMD® 2000+ (single core)RAM: 512 MBGraphic card: nVidia® GeForce® FX 5700 or ATI® Radeon® 9600Sound card: DirectX-compatibleDVD-RomPeripherals: keyboard and mouseOperating system: Microsoft® Windows® XP or VistaHard disk: 3 GB free disk spaceDirectX®: Version 9.0c (4.09.0000.0904)Recommended system requirements:Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2,4 GHz or AMD 3500+ (single core)RAM : 1 GBGraphic card: nVidia GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon X850XTSound card: DirectX-compatibleDVD-RomPeripherals: keyboard and mouseOperating system: Microsoft Windows XP or VistaHard disk: 3 GB free disk spaceDirectX: Version 9.0c (4.09.0000.0904)
